Player History
Drafted in 11th round, 171st overall pick, by Kansas City in 2015...
Injured on 4/6/2015 with a Hyper Extended Knee, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 8/24/2016 with a Pinched Nerve Neck, out for 6 days...
Had first career hit on 6/10/2018, off Zacarias Romero (SLB)...
Hit first career homerun on 6/16/2018, off Marion Tobler (BRO)...
Injured on 9/3/2018 with a Bruised Finger, out for 5 days...
Injured on 8/9/2019 with a Bruised Ribs, out for 1-2 weeks...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/4/2019, hitting .474 with 2 HR, 6 RBI...
Traded from Kansas City to Houston on 6/5/2020 (Going to KC: RF Hugh Lalonde, P Jason Delvalle. Going to HOU: C Hayden Bongiorno, 1B Bill West)...
Injured on 7/8/2020 with a Tight Knee, out for one week...
1/31/2022: Gets a new one-year contract worth $1,221,429 through salary arbitration...
1/31/2023: Gets a new one-year contract worth $1,221,429 through salary arbitration...
Injured on 6/19/2023 with a Dislocated Shoulder, out for 3-4 weeks...
1/31/2024: Gets a new one-year contract worth $1,271,429 through salary arbitration...
Injured on 6/16/2024 with a Concussion, out for 1-2 weeks...
9/21/2024: Signed a contract extension with Houston, $1,500,000 per year, for 3 years.
Won Gold Glove at Leftfield in 2025...
Injured on 6/13/2026 with a Strained Posterior Cruciate Ligament, out for 4 weeks...
Injured on 7/17/2027 with a Inflamed Thigh Muscle, out for one week...
8/19/2027: Signed a contract extension with Houston, $3,000,000 per year, for 2 years.
